data.comment: Today's referee, Allen Chapman, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 3, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 7, San Jose's Cristian Espinoza is on target but unsuccessful.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Vancouver throw-in in San Jose's half.
In the minute 8, Vancouver's Cristian Dajome attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
San Jose push forward at Earthquakes Stadium and Carlos Fierro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
In the minute 9, Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Throw-in San Jose.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andy Rose (Vancouver) gets a yellow card.
Allen Chapman awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 19, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Vancouver's Fredy Montero gets in a shot on goal at Earthquakes Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Vancouver's Fredy Montero goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Vancouver have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, San Jose have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Andy Rose (Vancouver) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by San Jose defenders.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Vancouver in San Jose.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In San Jose San Jose attack through Cristian Espinoza. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 30, Vancouver have a goal kick.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
San Jose are pushing forward but Cristian Espinoza's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Allen Chapman signals a San Jose throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 36, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman awards San Jose a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, The match at Earthquakes Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Leonard Owusu, who is down injured.
San Jose's Judson misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 41, San Jose drives forward and Carlos Fierro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vancouver's Leonard Owusu looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Michael Baldisimo of Vancouver smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of San Jose.
Vancouver pushes forward through Fredy Montero, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half has come to a close in San Jose.
In the minute 45, Florian Jungwirth (San Jose) has received a yellow card from Allen Chapman.
The second-half has started.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Russell Teibert with David Milinkovic.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
In the minute 50, San Jose have a goal kick.
Goal! Cristian Espinoza gives San Jose a 1-0 lead.
Nick Lima with an assist there.
In the minute 52, Free kick for San Jose in the half of Vancouver.
Andy Rose (Vancouver) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Nick Lima of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Vancouver at Earthquakes Stadium.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of San Jose.
Marc Dos Santos is making the team's second substitution at Earthquakes Stadium with Ranko Veselinovic replacing Tosaint Ricketts.
In the minute 56, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in San Jose.
Throw-in for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 58, San Jose's Carlos Fierro breaks free at Earthquakes Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Allen Chapman awards Vancouver a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Michael Baldisimo (Vancouver) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Vancouver are coming forward and Cristian Dajome gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
Free kick San Jose.
In the minute 64, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to Vancouver's area.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Goal! Andy Rios extends San Jose's lead to 2-0.
Carlos Fierro instrumental with a fine assist.
Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
In the minute 69, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to San Jose.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
San Jose pushes forward through Nick Lima, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 72, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Ryan Raposo is replacing Jake Nerwinski for Vancouver at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Michael Baldisimo with Patrick Metcalfe. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marc Dos Santos.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 75, Erik Godoy (Vancouver) has been sent off!
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
San Jose make their first substitution with Cade Cowell replacing Chris Wondolowski.
In the minute 77, Matias Jesus Almeyda (San Jose) is making a second substitution, with Shea Salinas replacing Andy Rios.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 79, Allen Chapman awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a fifth substitution, with Theo Bair replacing Fredy Montero.
In the minute 82, San Jose's Carlos Fierro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Earthquakes Stadium.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Vancouver throw-in in San Jose's half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in San Jose.
In the minute 85, Paul Marie is replacing Nick Lima for the home team.
Gilbert Fuentes is on a sub for Carlos Fierro for San Jose.
Cade Cowell gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 87, San Jose drive upfield and Judson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vancouver defender.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
San Jose make their fifth substitution with Siad Haji replacing Cristian Espinoza.
In the minute 89, Shea Salinas (San Jose) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
San Jose are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Allen Chapman will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Vancouver at Earthquakes Stadium.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Great finish from Paul Marie to give San Jose a 3-0 lead.
Great play from Tommy Thompson to set up the goal.
